While all the politicians mentioned have a significant role in shaping the healthcare systems of their respective countries, Angela Merkel's leadership and commitment to improving the German healthcare system make her stand out as a strong advocate for patient-centered care.

Merkel has been a vocal proponent of universal healthcare and has worked to ensure that all citizens have access to quality healthcare, regardless of their financial means.
